name: Claude Code
description: Installs Claude Code CLI using native binary installation

version.description: Select the version to install. Use 'stable' for the stable release, 'latest' for the most recent version, or specify a version number (e.g., '2.0.25').

useOAuthToken.description: If true, marks hasCompletedOnboarding as true to use OAuth token authentication.

autoUpdates.description: Enable automatic updates for Claude Code.

useSandbox.description: Install bubblewrap for sandbox support. Required for bash command sandboxing on Linux.
